title: A Small town idol
creator_credit: Mack Sennett, Erle C Kenton and Mack Sennett Comedies
brief_description: Slapstick comedy about small town resident, Sam Smith (Ben Turpin) who has been framed for stealing by the scoundrel J. Wellington Jones as a ploy to stop him from wooing Mary (Phyllis Haver), the prettiest single girl in town. Cast also includes Charlie Murray, Marie Prevost, Billy Bevan.
